name: Virus Killer (itch) (Oktanel)
description:
Kill All The Virus to Win

KEYBOARD Binding:

+General

- WASD, walk in normal Mode and Battle Mode

-  TAB, to Switch Mode(Normal and Battle Mode)

- Shift,  Speed Walking

+Mode Battle

- Right Click(Mouse), attacking in Mode Battle

- Left Click(Mouse), change target

- Space, Dodge
